name: Visit
description: Visit a set of location in an unspecified order

name: Ordered Visit
description: The sequenced visit pattern does not forbid to visit a successor location before its predecessor, but only that after the predecessor is visited the successor is also visited. Ordered visit forbids a successor to be visited before its predecessor.

name: Strict Ordered Visit
description: The ordered visit pattern does not avoid a predecessor location to be visited multiple times before its successor. Strict ordered visit forbids the behavior.

name: Patrolling
description: Keep visiting a set of locations, but not a particular order. The patrolling problem also appears in literature as surveillance.

name: Ordered Patrolling
description: Sequence patrolling deos not forbid to visit a successor location before its predecessor. Ordered patrolling ensures that (after a successor is visited) the successor is not visited (again) before its predecessor.

name: Strict Ordered Patrolling
description: The ordered patrolling does not avoid a predecessor location to be visited multiple times before its successor. Strict Ordered Patrolling ensures that, after a predecessor is visited, it is not visited again before its successor.

name: Strict Order
description: Modification of StrictOrderedPatrolling, it impose the order but not the actual visit.The ordered patrolling does not avoid a predecessor location to be visited multiple times before its successor. Strict Ordered Patrolling ensures that, after a predecessor is visited, it is not visited again before its successor.

name: Order Location
description: Modification of OrderedPatrolling, it impose the order but not the actual visit.The ordered patrolling does not avoid a predecessor location to be visited multiple times before its successor. Strict Ordered Patrolling ensures that, after a predecessor is visited, it is not visited again before its successor.

name: Init Instantaneous Reaction
description: At the first step, the occurrence of a stimulus instantaneously triggers a counteraction.

name: Init Bound Reaction
description: At the first step, a counteraction must be performed every time and only when a specific location is entered.

name: Init Bound Delay
description: At the first step, a counteraction must be performed, in the next time instant, every time and only when a specific location is entered.

name: Init Prompt Reaction
description: At the first step, the occurrence of a stimulus triggers a counteraction promptly, i.e in the next time instant.

name: Init Delayed Reaction
description: At the first step, the occurrence of a stimulus triggers a counteraction some time later.

name: Instantaneous Reaction
description: The occurrence of a stimulus instantaneously triggers a counteraction.

name: Bound Reaction
description: A counteraction must be performed every time and only when a specific location is entered.

name: Bound Delay
description: A counteraction must be performed, in the next time instant, every time and only when a specific location is entered.

name: Prompt Reaction
description: The occurrence of a stimulus triggers a counteraction promptly, i.e in the next time instant.

name: Delayed Reaction
description: The occurrence of a stimulus triggers a counteraction some time later.

name: Wait
description: Inaction is desired till a stimulus occurs.
